projects.title: My Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- A Personal Developer Portfolio built using React to showcase my skills, projects and experiences.
 - Fully responsive with light/dark mode support.

projects.title: MITHRA: AI Voice Assistant for Chennai Metro
projects.bodyText:
- An AI-powered, multi-agent voice bot system built with **Gemini LLM** and **RAG** for **metro passenger guidance** and **ticket booking**.
 - Features **multilingual voice support** (Tamil, Hindi, English).
 - Co-developed with CMRL as my final year industry project.

projects.title: SumMate: AI Text Summarizer
projects.bodyText:
- A powerful full-stack web app for **Text Summarization** using **NodeJS** and the **Hugging Face Inference API**.
 - Designed an **intuitive user interface** with **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**.
 - Tested and Integrated **APIs** using **Postman**.

projects.title: TickTickBoom Todos
projects.bodyText:
- A sleek and user-friendly **Todos List** app using **React** with **Material-UI** components. 
 - Allows users to **add**, **delete** and **mark todos as completed**, with a **priority status** option to **track important tasks**. 
 - Integrated **Redux** for **state management** and **JEST** for **unit testing**.

projects.title: SmartSpend: Financial Planning Coach
projects.bodyText:
- Created an interactive AI-powered **financial planning assistant** for young working professionals in India.
 - Built and deployed using **Amazon PartyRock** and the **Claude 3.5 Sonnet** model.
 - Developed under the **AWS AI & ML Scholars 2025** Challenge.

projects.title: Vipose Billing Software
projects.bodyText:
- An inclusive **Billing Software** using **React** that enables **visually impaired users** to perform billing tasks.
 - Integrated **Razorpay** for the **Payment Gateway**. 
 - Uses **Cloud Firestore** database to store grocery bills.
 - Generates a **printable bill** designed using **HTML/CSS** upon **successful payment.**

projects.title: Flair: E-Commerce Website
projects.bodyText:
- A beautiful, responsive **E-commerce website UI** for a **clothing brand**. This website was submitted as a **Major Project** for my **web development internship** at YHills.
 - Designed using **HTML**, **CSS**, **JavaScript** and **Bootstrap**, the website offers a **seamless shopping experience** for users.

projects.title: TripVista: Travel Blog Website
projects.bodyText:
- A **personal travel blog** website to share your **travel adventures, tips, and captivating photos** with the world.
 - Built a **visually engaging, responsive UI** with **interactive animations** using **HTML, CSS** and **JavaScript**.
 - Originally **hosted** on **IBM Cloud Static Web Apps**.

projects.title: The Sparks Bank
projects.bodyText:
- A **basic banking system** website wherein **money can be transfered** to and from customers.
 - A ledger is maintained for **viewing customer details** as well as the **history of transactions**.
 - Developed using **HTML, CSS, and PHP** with **MySQL** database.

projects.title: Deepfake Images Detector
projects.bodyText:
- An open-source **Deepfake Images Detector** for **classifying images** as real or deepfake.
 - Implements 3 deep learning models - **CNN, CapsNet and Xception**.
 - **Compared and Evaluated** each of the models based on **accuracy and loss**. The **Xception model** was found to be the **most accurate** with an accuracy score of **68.96%**.

projects.title: Library Management System
projects.bodyText:
- A **GUI desktop app** built using **JavaFX** and **MySQL** to enable CRUD operations for **library books management**.
 - Allows users to **add, delete and view books** in a graphical table format.
 - This was my **mini project** for the **Database Managment Systems (DBMS)** course in my 4th Semester.

projects.title: Replit Bounties Dataset Analysis
projects.bodyText:
- A **Data Analysis** project aimed at analyzing the **Replit Bounties Dataset** on **Kaggle**.
 - Uses **Linear Regression**, **Decision Tree Classifier, & K-Nearest Neighbours (KNN)** algorithms to implement the predictive models.
 - **Performed EDA** and **data preprocessing/cleaning** to ensure integrity of the dataset. **Visualized insights** using **bar graphs** and **histograms**.
